text: Miriam Defensor Santiago (June 15, 1945 - September 29, 2016) is a Filipino politician, known for having served in all three branches of the Philippines government â€“ judicial, executive, and legislative. Defensor Santiago was named one of The 100 Most Powerful Women in the World in 1997 by The Australian. == References == Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Iloilo
title: Miriam Defensor Santiago
